He asked us whom we would visit. He asked us, “Whom _______?”

The teacher insisted on the students’ arriving punctually for their lessons.

The teacher insisted that the students _______ punctually for their lessons.
Most people don’t even know _______.
I refuse to believe her having told me the truth. I refuse to believe that she _______ me the truth.
They proposed that a new highway_______.
It is desirable that no one else _______ about the problem.
That she was chosen Miss Turkey _______.
options: everyone present voted in her favor

questions.question: Whether they do it or not _______.
options: will cause a lot of disturbance

questions.question: I am satisfied _______.
options: that she came third in the competition.
it was our victory against enemies
will make her happy, I believe
questions.answer: that she came third in the competition.

questions.question: The fact that they blamed us for the accident _______.
options: at which a person was killed

questions.question: _______ is a fact.
options: That the poor have a hard life

questions.question: Did _______ help him in his career?
options: the fact that his father was a professor
questions.answer: the fact that his father was a professor

questions.question: It is incredible that _______.
It is necessary that everyone _______ here on time.

“If I were you, I’d open a bank account because interest is high now” I told her.

I suggested that she _______ a saving account.
Our teacher wishes he _______ another profession.
I wish the teacher ______ us more about the exam before it takes place.
I wish you _______ here now. I miss you a lot.
I wish you _______. I’m sure you would enjoy joining us.
She won’t help me. I wish she _______ me.
I wish I _______ the last bus. Now I’ll have to walk.
Don’t you wish we _______ tonight?
It is raining. I wish it _______.
When it was too late, he wished he _______ a better husband.
You can’t change things simply by wishing they _______ different.
I wish he _______ to Tokyo with me last weekend.
I wish that you _______ such a bad headache because I’m sure that you’d have enjoyed the party.
I wish that I _______ with you last summer.

You might have cleaned the bath after you’d used it.

I wish you _______ the bath after using it.
You might come to work a bit earlier on Mondays. I wish you _______ a bit earlier on Mondays.
You might have remembered my birthday. I wish you _______ my birthday.
You might make less noise. If only you _______ less noise.
If only I _____ busy yesterday. I could have helped you with the problem.
He wishes his father _____ him some shoes before the new term starts.
I wish our school _______ a bigger library than it has.
I wish we _______ late for this film. I can’t follow the story.
She wishes she _______ younger than she is.

A: Janet couldn’t come to the concert last night.

B: I wish she _______ .

I couldn’t get through the traffic in time.

I wish I _______ through the traffic in time.

My father wasn’t able to pay the money back.

I wish my father _______ the money back.
It is a pity you drink too much. If only you _______ so much.
It is a pity that we rejected their proposal. If only we _______ their proposal.
A: I must go home now. B: I wish you _______ home now.

A: Don’t you have enough time to learn English?

B: No, I don’t. I wish I _______ time to learn English.
The bus always stops at every bus stop. I wish it _______ at every bus stop.
The party was so bad that they left early. They wish _______.

A: Sandy had an accident because she wasn’t careful.

B: If only she _______.

A: Robert is unhappy because he can’t find his passport.

B: If only he _______.

A: We have to cancel the match because it is raining.

B: If only it _______.

A: Mary is sorry that she bought such an expensive dress.

B: If only she _______ such an expensive dress.
Don’t you think it is significant _______?
options: that he has been re elected
if we had been offered the job
questions.answer: that he has been re elected

questions.question: Water is a compound _______ molecule consists of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen.
A dynamo is a machine _______ is used for producing electricity.
The student couldn’t remember the year _______ Hitler was born.
That is the hotel _______ I stayed at.
Hydrogen is an element _______ atomic number is 1 and _______ atomic weight is 1.008.
Neron, _______ was Emperor of Rome, from 45 to 68 A.D, is believed to have murdered both his mother and his wife.
Marlon Brando, _______, is a friend of my fathers.
options: whose son is in jail now
that you met at the seminar
questions.answer: whose son is in jail now

questions.question: The problem was with the battery _______ a dead cell.
There were fifty questions on the test, _______.
options: all of them were very hard
all of whom were very interested

questions.question: I’m looking for something with _______ I can clean the board.
Gentlemen, from _______ we expect politeness, ought not to lose their tempers.
Your information, for _______ I’m grateful, is very helpful.
Men _______ work is good receive high wages.
He did his medical training at a hospital _______.
options: who is very famous as a surgeon
of which is located just beside a river
whose patients are treated very carefully

questions.question: That evening we went to the opera, _______.
options: where we met the newly appointed general director
that was opened last week by the Minister of Culture
when all the lights went out
questions.answer: where we met the newly appointed general director

questions.question: His father, _______, said he didn’t like to work.
options: that had retired a few weeks ago
he gave a series of interviews
who was already over sixty   five
questions.answer: who was already over sixty five

questions.question: Mr. Benson, _______, shot himself.
options: that was known to be very rich
whose firm closed because of complaints
questions.answer: whose firm closed because of complaints

questions.question: Crops can now be grown in deserts _______.
options: most of them are in Africa
it was impossible to cultivate the land
where farming would be impossible without irrigation
these are known as dry areas
questions.answer: where farming would be impossible without irrigation

questions.question: The boys _______ are having special lessons.
options: they are behind the other boys
who have been offered a scholarship
questions.answer: who have been offered a scholarship

questions.question: It was they _______.
options: when they came to see us

questions.question: They refused to be reasonable about the delay, _______.
options: that caused a lot of trouble

questions.question: George ordered an enormous steak, _______.
The students in the early class, _______, did very well on yesterday’s maths test.
options: they study very hard all semester
very few of them had studied very hard
most of whom had studied the night before
questions.answer: most of whom had studied the night before

questions.question: He forgot to get the tickets, _______.
options: whose wife got very angry with him
where his wife wanted to see
which annoyed his wife very much
questions.answer: which annoyed his wife very much

questions.question: It is nuclear war, which could exterminate mankind, _______.
The book was ______ boring ______ I only could read two chapters.
It was ______ a boring book ______ I only could read two chapters.
_______ you talk to him, _______ you like him.
_______ I didn’t know anybody at the reception, I had a good time.
_____ I’ve finished “A Tale of Two Cities, I’ll read “Oliver Twist”.
No sooner had I opened the door _______ the telephone rang.
_______ you’re happy about it, I have no objection.
He didn’t have any money, _______ he couldn’t buy a ticket.
He had enough money to buy a ticket, _____, he decided not to go.
He wanted to go with us; _______ he packed his suitcase.
It is late; _______, it is raining cats and dogs.
I didn’t have enough time; _______, I couldn’t go.
She’s been working for eight hours; _______, she is tired.
I’ll finish this. Then I’ll join you. When I _______ this, I’ll join you.
She dressed the child in a heavy overcoat, _______ he should catch cold.
I’ve written it down for her, _______ she forgets it.
I will go home for vacation as soon as I _______ my exams.
When she arrived, I was pretty fed up, because I _______ since eight o’clock.
We left early _______ avoid the traffic.
They tiptoed up the stairs _______ wake the children.
We won’t go unless the weather _______ fine.
I was on vacation; _______, I didn’t get your letter.
Dr. King gives interesting lectures; _______, he is very popular with his students.
Robert didn’t study for the test; _______ he did very well.
James wants to buy a new car, _____ he doesn’t have enough money.
He found everything rather strange, as he _______ abroad before.
_______ coal reserves are abundant, taking advantage of them requires an active program of development.
_______ the price of petrol is so high, I can’t afford to run a car any more.
_______ the bans remained in force, Turkey could not claim to be fully democratic.
Doctors often use X rays _____ they can pass through skin and flesh.
Within another hundred years we will have to find alternative sources of energy, _______ the world’s reserves of oil will not last that long.
An airline pilot and a racing driver are similar _______ they must possess good judgment and the ability to react quickly in a crisis.
They built a high fence around the building _______ no one could get out.
The old woman had to stand all the way _______ no one let her sit down on the bus.
He stole the money _______ I warned him not to.
We were _______ late _______ we missed the plane to Istanbul.
I had to work until midnight _______ I was very tired.
_______ I took an aspirin, I still have a headache.

A: You studied hard. Did you pass the test?
B: No, _______ I studied hard, I didn’t pass the test.
It was cold; _______ we went on a picnic.
_______ he had a broken leg, he continued to go to class.
options: In spite of the fact that
questions.answer: In spite of the fact that

questions.question: Some people are fat, _______ others are thin.
_______ some students think physics is easy, others find it difficult.

Do you want to walk? The rain has stopped.
_______ the rain’s stopped, do you want to walk?
_______ it’s raining, I think I’ll stay at home.
_______ Monday is a national holiday, all government offices will be closed.
I’ll eat lunch with you _______ there is enough for both of us.
We’ll get along just fine _______ he minds his own business.
Apparently Betty is jealous ______ I get better grades than she does.
_______ I apologized, he looked as if he wanted to strangle me.
The government puts up taxes _______ get more money from us.
I wrote down the address _______ I wouldn’t forget it.
Roy talks _______ nonsense that no one listens to him anymore.
She doesn’t mind working overtime _______ she’s paid for it.
We have to do the job _______ we like it or not.
I did my homework _______ our teacher had instructed.
I’ll give you my telephone number _______ you want to get in touch with me again.
I obeyed her _______ she should be angry.
Please turn down the TV. I want to be able to get to sleep. Please turn down the TV so that _______.
Please be quiet so that _______.
options: I can hear what the teacher is saying
I heard what the teacher said
to hear what the teacher is saying
questions.answer: I can hear what the teacher is saying

questions.question: Mike decided to become an anthropologist _______.
options: so he can study the life of a primitive tribe
that’s why he will watch the documentary film on a primitive tribe
after he saw a documentary film on a primitive tribe
due to the fact that the film is on a primitive tribe
questions.answer: after he saw a documentary film on a primitive tribe

questions.question: “Having seen that film before, she wants to see a different one.” means: _______
options: As she has seen a different film before, she can see this film.
Because she’s seen that film before, she wants to go to a different one.
As she’d seen that film before, she wanted to see a different one.
Because she wants to see that film, she can watch it.
questions.answer: As she’d seen that film before, she wanted to see a different one.

questions.question: “Having worked all day, I was tired last night.” means: _______.
options: As I had worked all day, I was feeling tired last night.
I worked tiringly hard all day yesterday.
Since I’ve worked all day, I am tired now.
Because I was tired last night, I worked all day.
questions.answer: As I had worked all day, I was feeling tired last night.

questions.question: “I got to the airport at 9.15. My plane left ten minutes later.” means: _______.
options: My plane had left ten minutes ago.
Before I got to the airport, my plane had taken off.
I got to the airport just before my plane left.
questions.answer: I got to the airport just before my plane left.

questions.question: Since he’s not interested in classical music, he _______.
options: would have gone to the concert
had decided not to go to the concert
was supposed to go to the concert

questions.question: _______ the semester is finished, I’m going to rest a few days and then take a trip.
This is _______ book that I don’t think I’ll finish it.
I can’t repair the dishwasher myself _______.
options: so I will get someone to do it for me
unless the repairman had helped me
questions.answer: so I will get someone to do it for me

questions.question: I’ve gained _______ weight that I can’t wear any of my old clothes.
I’ve met _______ people in the last few days that I can’t possibly remember all of their names.
Ever since I was a child, I _______ afraid of dogs.
Janet’s contact lens popped out while she _______.
Be sure to reread your composition for errors before you _______ it in to the teacher tomorrow.
By the time I leave this city, I _______ here for ten years.
“We can’t leave now. We have to wait for Peggy.” means: _______
options: We can’t leave because Peggy isn’t here.
We must leave now, because Peggy is waiting for us.
Peggy is waiting; we can’t leave.
We must stay here until Peggy arrives.
questions.answer: We must stay here until Peggy arrives.

questions.question: “_______ the terrible weather, we enjoyed ourselves.
“My roommate walked into the room. Immediately, I knew that something was wrong.” means: _______ I knew that something was wrong.
options: As soon as my roommate entered the room,
Before my roommate walked into the room,
By the time my roommate came into the room,
After my roommate came into the room,
questions.answer: As soon as my roommate entered the room,

questions.question: _______ the harm she’s done him, he still loves her.
_______ hard I try, I still can’t do it.
_______ quickly you work, you’ll never catch up.
You’d better leave now. _______, you’ll have to get a taxi home.
He left school at sixteen, _______ he has had no real education.
She didn’t seem to recognize me _______ we had never met.
The food may be good at the Harvard but it’s _______ expensive.
People normally treat you just_______ you treat them.
He acted strangely, _______ he was frightened,
The weather was _______ bad _______ we didn’t go to the seaside.
It was hot, _______ I didn’t need my coat.
She doesn’t like phones in living rooms, and _____ does her sister.
____ everybody seemed to be out of cigarettes, I passed mine round.
____ she had sung, the whole audience stood and applauded loudly.
_______ he is very rich, he lives very simply.
_______ you say to her, she still keeps smiling.
You shouldn’t be rude, _______ you’re very angry.
You can phone me _______ you like.
He speaks English much _______ he writes it.
Mr. Taylor, I’m here just in case _______.
options: anything out of the ordinary happens
they telephoned to meet them at the airport
questions.answer: anything out of the ordinary happens

questions.question: I’m in a difficult situation in that _______.
options: I’ve been offered two jobs and they both sound interesting
I don’t want to get disillusioned
questions.answer: I’ve been offered two jobs and they both sound interesting

questions.question: He feels himself to be dependent in that_______.
options: he is not free to question decisions affecting his daily life
he isn’t in good health and spirits
the company collapsed within six months
early retirement is a means of reducing the workforce
questions.answer: he isn’t in good health and spirits

questions.question: Be clear and factual in order that _______.
options: there will be many exciting opportunities in the future
agriculture and rural industry are flourishing

questions.question: I’d have married her even _______.
options: her parents had given their consent
she’d rather I had married her
she was in love with another man

questions.question: He grabbed me and shook me till _______.
options: he would have noticed I had a gun

questions.question: Long before you return _______.
options: we’d sold out of your size

questions.question: I had no sooner checked in to the hotel_______.
options: when two gunmen ordered me to open my briefcase
than he arrived with the appropriate documents
a young lady approached me with a smile
before all rooms have been reserved
questions.answer: than he arrived with the appropriate documents

questions.question: Hardly had he uttered the words _______.
options: as soon as everybody sat down

questions.question: Nobody gets anything unless _______.
I get an electrician to check all my electrical appliances every autumn whether or not _______.
options: he is very good at it

questions.question: “They built a statue of him lest people should forget what he had done.” means: _______.
options: They built a statue of him so that people would not forget what he had done.
They built a statue of him because people wouldn’t forget what he had done.
As people would forget what he had done one day, they built a statue of him.
Believing that it was necessary for people not to forget what he had done, they had a statue of him built.
questions.answer: They built a statue of him so that people would not forget what he had done.

questions.question: Tourism is a good thing inasmuch as _______.
options: if we are to pay our debts
it brings people into contact with other nations
questions.answer: it brings people into contact with other nations

questions.question: I used to love listening to her, even though _______.
options: she has nothing interesting to mention
we didn’t have a radio to listen to
she was a good friend of mine
I could only understand about half of what she said
questions.answer: I could only understand about half of what she said

questions.question: Nobody said a thing except that _______.
options: one or two asked me if I was better
I would tell them everything in detail
they had already told everything in their mind
a man who has been involved in the accident
questions.answer: one or two asked me if I was better

questions.question: In Turkey, _______ you come across ceremonies.
I was never allowed to do the things_______.
options: the way I wanted to do them
I’m very keen on carrying out
nevertheless, I am very determined to solve
questions.answer: the way I wanted to do them

questions.question: She felt as if _______.
options: the fur coat was very nice
she is in a crowded stadium

questions.question: His hair looked as if _______.
options: it had been combed with his fingers
it hasn’t been cut for ages

questions.question: I felt as if _______.
options: I’ve done my best for the realization of the project
I were the center of the universe
questions.answer: I were the center of the universe

questions.question: He behaved as though _______.
options: it was nothing to be ashamed of
he has come to a garden party
questions.answer: it was nothing to be ashamed of

questions.question: Our aim is to recruit the most qualified person, _______.
options: unless there are some really good ones
whether or not we liked them
no matter where he is from
whichever way you looked at it
questions.answer: no matter where he is from

questions.question: I’d do anything to get that contract, but it is highly unlikely _______.
options: that my firm will get it
if my firm can get it
questions.answer: that my firm will get it

questions.question: They decided to postpone the match, _______ the weather conditions were better than they had expected.
